snippet.title: Lost In Space - Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the trailer of "Lost In Space" a game I made.
You can try the game now : https://timkrief.itch.io/lostinspace

You play as a space-ship and have to stay alive as long as you can, dodging or destroying asteroids. It's An arcade bullet-hell shooter without enemies and without bullets ! Nobody achieved 1 light-year score for the moment, it's the ultimate challenge.

Subscribe here, follow me on twitter (https://twitter.com/timkrief) and on itch.io (https://timkrief.itch.io/)

Credit:

Game: Code, design, etc. by Tim Krief

Music: 

Intro: Lost In Space by Musiken
Ingame: Funk City by Reatch CC BY
